body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. My name is Christopher Kelly and I represent Elite Motors, a premium car dealership. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Christopher, my name is Mary King.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Mary. Could you please provide me with your date of birth for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's the twenty second of July, nineteen eighty five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Mary. Additionally, could you share the last four digits of your social security number with me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's three six four zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information with me, Mary. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that was all for now. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Mary. Thank you for your time and for choosing Elite Motors. Have a wonderful day!
